name: Flat Trip
description: Flat Trip is a small platformer adventure, set in the doodly world of Flat Land – the weirdest place of all. Simple gameplay mechanics with challenging gameplay moments, interesting looking graphics and an awesome soundtrack – those are the core features of this game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2 GHz dual-core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated AMD or NVIDIA Graphic card 2GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any soundcard Additional Notes: Users with integrated videocards may have low performance in game.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHz dual-core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated AMD or NVIDIA Graphic card 2GB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any soundcard Additional Notes: Users with integrated videocards may have low performance in game.
